title: Album, Plans, Coupes, Elevations, Des...Maisons et des Hotels Construits a Paris...
title_raw: Plans, Coupes, Elevations, Des...Maisons et des Hotels Construits a Paris...
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description:
Krafft, Jean Charles (1764-1838)

Frontispiece, title page, Advertisement, Explication, 20 cahiers, 120 plates, Conclusion.

Architecture & plans, panels, doors, ceilings, windows,
Furniture, including beds, chairs, desks, tables, sofa, washstand, stools, bookcases.

Dessine par J. C. Krafft, et grave par N. Ransonnette a Paris chez Krafft et Ransonnette. (ca. 1802)

D. 293

tombstone.epitaph:
Album, Plans, Coupes, Elevations, Des...Maisons et des Hotels Construits a Paris.... 
Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-551
